title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 197: Featuring Terry Ryan + Teddy Purcell
description:
It's â€˜Newfoundland Week' on this week's episode of Spittin' Chiclets. The guys are joined by both Terry Ryan and Teddy Purcell, two Newfoundlanders who made it to the NHL and had some crazy stories along the way. Biz talks to Terry live from his legendary basement in the house he grew up in while Teddy calls in to catch the boys up on his summer and who he has been working with. The boys also talk some NHL news including the Mitch Marner news as well as the boys discuss Whit's annual Golf Trip.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
